    • Constructor Detail

      • DocumentsTable

        public DocumentsTable(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite composite,
              org.eclipse.swt.events.SelectionListener selectionListener,
              ChangeListener changeListener)
               throws SophieException
        Create a new table listing Solr documents.
        Parameters:
        composite - Parent composite.
        selectionListener - Selection listener - allows certain buttons to be enabled only when a document is selected.
        changeListener - Change listener - allows the 'Upload' button to detect whether there are local changes to send to Solr.
        Throws:
        SophieException - If the table could not be created.

    • Method Detail

        Get field names.
        Returns:
        List of field names.

      • getSelectedDocument

        public org.apache.solr.common.SolrDocument getSelectedDocument()
        Get the currently selected document.
        Returns:
        Currently selected document, or null if not row is selected.

      • refresh

        public void refresh()
             throws SophieException
        Clear table and flush internal cache. This causes the table to be re-populated with remote documents.
        Throws:
        SophieException - If the documents could not be fetched from Solr.

      • export

        public void export()
            throws SophieException
        Export documents into CSV file.
        Throws:
        SophieException - If the documents could not be exported into a CSV file.

      • upload

        public void upload()
            throws SophieException
        Upload local changes to the Solr server.
        Throws:
        SophieException - If the local changes could not be uploaded to the Solr server.

      • restore

        public void restore(String backupName)
             throws SophieException
        Restore index from a backup
        Parameters:
        backupName - Backup file name.
        Throws:
        SophieException - If the backup could not be restored.

      • deleteSelectedDocument

        public void deleteSelectedDocument()
        Delete the selected document locally.
        Parameters:
        item - Row containing the document to delete.

      • addField

        public void addField(String fieldName,
            org.apache.solr.client.solrj.response.LukeResponse.FieldInfo field)
        Add new field to the table. No values are provided to the filter.
        Parameters:
        fieldName - Field name.
        field - Field definition.
